column1: NGR is 406 The Strand where the company J H Steward Ltd was based, the observers are members of the Steward family. The gauge was on the roof and altitudes appear consistent with this. 1900s records states that the location is next door to Charing Cross P.O., which does not seem right, I can see no evidence of PO  near here and the main PO was 300m  west.
There are gaps in the early records and there is no explanation
